HomeCards.header_3: Empower your team with a top designer and scale your design capabilities.

overlayServicesCard.head->p: We cover all of your design needs. We team up with founders and startups to bring their ideas to life—whether it's a simple landing page, a complete website, logo, branding, mobile and web apps design.
overlayServicesCard.head->li_2: Deep-dive into your product and ideas
overlayServicesCard.Service_1_Description: Whether it's starting fresh or brushing up what you already have. We've worked on simple habit trackers to full-scale trading platforms.
overlayServicesCard.Service_2_Description: We are here to tell your story through design, building every shape and vector from scratch without relying on templates. We design everything you need, including graphics, social media, banners, cards, ads, etc.
overlayServicesCard.Service_3_Description: You need support with the implementation of your brand? Our experienced brand designers will help you develop a top brand.

overlayAboutCard.headTexts->p: LYERZ is the design service we always wanted. Unmatched quality, efficient processes & transparent pricing.
overlayAboutCard.card_1_heading->p_2: Make as many requests as you need. All tasks will be done one after the other and revisions are included!
overlayAboutCard.card_2_heading->p_2: Receive your first design drafts within 48 hours. You can provide feedback or download them directly.
overlayAboutCard.card_3_heading->p_2: No more surprises with high design fees. Instead, you only pay your fixed monthly price.
overlayAboutCard.card_4_heading->p_2: By hiring only the best designers, we make sure to always deliver stunning designs to wow your future clients.
overlayAboutCard.card_5_heading->p_2: We strive to create design that is memorable, innovative, and impactful. We want our clients to be wowed by the work we produce but also the interaction with us. If there is a chance to create a “WoW” moment, we take it.
overlayAboutCard.card_6_heading->p_2: We take responsibility for our work and are accountable for our actions. We don't shy away from challenges or difficult conversations. Instead, we own up to our mistakes and actively seek solutions to problems.
overlayAboutCard.p->text: We've been in the trenches, working side by side with founders and teams. We know what it's like. Startups need growth, and we're here to make sure your design pulls its weight.
overlayAboutCard.about_summary-content-item_1-texts->p_2: In your design dashboard, you can create briefings for a new design task in no time. No more unstructured task descriptions via mail.
overlayAboutCard.about_summary-content-item_2-texts->p_2: You have a design task that needs to be done quickly? No problem - you can always decide which of your submitted tasks should be processed first.
overlayAboutCard.about_summary-content-item_3-texts->p_2: The Magic Design platform enables efficient collaboration through our communication and project management tools.
overlayAboutCard.about_summary-content-item_4-texts->p_2: You can give direct feedback and request changes to your design. Once you have approved the final design, your designer will take care of the next design task.
overlayAboutCard.about_summary-content-item_5-texts->p_1: Your finished designs - all in one place
overlayAboutCard.about_summary-content-item_5-texts->p_2: From your dashboard, you can access, download, and share all designs at any time. With our all-in-one solution, there is no need to send files via email, Google Drive, or WeTransfer.
overlayAboutCard.Our_Mission_p_1: Whether it's a landing page, a white paper, or a presentation - good design has become indispensable in various fields today.
overlayAboutCard.Our_Mission_p_2: Besides communicating a company's image & brand, appealing and user-friendly design ensures a positive customer journey.
overlayAboutCard.Our_Mission_p_3: We know from our own experience how time-consuming, costly and nerve-wracking it can be to build and sustainably scale a design team.
overlayAboutCard.Our_Mission_p_4: With LYERZ, we provide companies with a solution we have been dreaming of ourselves.
overlayAboutCard.Our_Mission_p_5: Unlimited Design, One Subscription: Effortless. Affordable. Magical.

overlayPlansCard.headText_p: Add a top designer to your team for a fixed monthly price.
overlayPlansCard.Checklist_item_p_1: You genuinely care about your product and how it impacts your users
overlayPlansCard.Checklist_item_p_2: You're in regular conversations with your users, and their feedback directly shapes your product
overlayPlansCard.Checklist_item_p_3: Your goal isn't to mimic your competition, you're aiming for something uniquely yours
overlayPlansCard.customPlan_p: Perfect for a bigger one-time thing.
overlayPlansCard.button_p: Learn more about how LYERZ works and how it can help you.
overlayPlansCard.head_p: request at a time. Pause or cancel anytime.
overlayPlansCard.hint_iterate: We iterate until you are satisfied 100%
overlayPlansCard.plans-plan_1-pricingContent->p_2: Best if you're looking for steady and ongoing design work.
overlayPlansCard.plans-plan_2-pricingContent->p_2: For ongoing support and consistent updates to your existing Webflow site.
overlayPlansCard.plans-plan_3-pricingContent->p_2: Perfect for a bigger one-time thing
overlayPlansCard.Question_1_question: What exactly does 'Unlimited Design Tasks' mean?
overlayPlansCard.Question_1_answer_part_1: At LYERZ, we do not charge by hours or projects.
overlayPlansCard.Question_1_answer_part_2: Once you have chosen a design subscription, you can set as many tasks as you like. These will be processed by your personal designer one after the other.
overlayPlansCard.Question_2_question: What counts as a Design Task?
overlayPlansCard.Question_2_answer_part_1: Our team at LYERZ can handle any type of design job: big or small. So, you might be wondering: What counts as one design task? Need a presentation, flyer, landing page, or some ads? Just tell us what you want through your personal dashboard and we'll get it done in under 48 hours!
overlayPlansCard.Question_2_answer_part_2: Have a bigger project, like a whole new website, an app, or branding guidelines? These typically take more time and planning, so we can break them down into smaller tasks and make sure everything looks great. For example if we're talking about Branding Guidelines, to achieve a result that truly represents your brand and fits with your vision, we deliver the guidelines step by step & one task at a time with a turnaround of 48 hours as usual ( Logo, Typography, Illustrations, etc. ).
overlayPlansCard.Question_2_answer_part_3: Have more questions? Contact us at hi@lyerz.com. We can make your design ideas a reality, big or small. Let's put an end to design stress and create something magical together!
overlayPlansCard.Question_3_question: I am not satisfied with the design. How many revisions can I request?
overlayPlansCard.Question_3_answer_part_1: The first priority for us is that you are satisfied with the final design. Whether it's a display banner, an icon set or newsletter graphics.
overlayPlansCard.Question_3_answer_part_2: Therefore, you can request unlimited revisions and always communicate your change requests to your designer.
overlayPlansCard.Question_4_question: When do I receive the first drafts?
overlayPlansCard.Question_4_answer: Most designs will be delivered in under 48h. More complex tasks such as a landing page design we divide into partial deliverables. We will always keep you updated on the progress.
overlayPlansCard.Question_5_question: What types of designs can you realize?
overlayPlansCard.Question_5_answer_part_1: You can find the list of our design services

overlayPlansCard.Question_6_answer_part_1: We do not (yet) cover the following design services:

overlayPlansCard.Question_9_question: I would like to sign up for a subscription. How does the onboarding process work?
overlayPlansCard.Question_9_answer_part_1: After you have decided to subscribe, we will conduct an onboarding call to better understand your business and your design needs. During the call, we'll also explain the design process and upload your brand assets together.
overlayPlansCard.Question_9_answer_part_2: We'll then match you with a designer from our team and you'll be given access to your design dashboard, where you can get started right away with your first briefing.
overlayPlansCard.Question_10_question: I am not satisfied with my designer. Can I switch to another designer?
overlayPlansCard.Question_10_answer: Should it be the case that you're not happy with the style of your designer, you can always change your personal designer, without a hassle.
overlayPlansCard.Question_11_question: Is it possible to pause my subscription?
overlayPlansCard.Question_11_answer: Yes, you can pause your subscription at any time for the following month.
overlayPlansCard.Question_12_answer_part_1: Our remote design team is located worldwide, as good designers are not only found in the hot spots like Berlin, London and Paris.
overlayPlansCard.Question_12_answer_part_2: To ensure the highest quality standards, all designers complete a 4-stage selection process, with 3% of applicants being accepted at the end.
overlayPlansCard.Question_13_question: Can I invite multiple team members to use LYERZ at the same time?
overlayPlansCard.Question_13_answer: Yes, you can invite as many team members as you want. Team members can set individual tasks or work together on design tasks.
overlayPlansCard.Question_14_question: Can I cancel my subscription monthly?
overlayPlansCard.Question_14_answer: Yes, we do not have long contract periods. Your subscription will be renewed every month and you can cancel it 7 days before the end of the payment cycle.
overlayPlansCard.Question_15_question: Which payment options do you offer?
overlayPlansCard.Question_15_answer: You can pay LYERZ by credit card, PayPal, direct debit or bank transfer.
